sampled.completion:
1. "Why did the pineapple go to the doctor? Because it was feeling under the weather! Now that's some fruity humor right there!"
2. Here are some humorous one-liners about pineapples:

• I bought my friend a pineapple for their birthday, but they got mad and said it was a prickly gift.
• My wife left me because she thought I was too sweet, so I added more pineapple to the marinade in an attempt to win her back.
• The other day I went to a pineapple party and all they served were appetizers. It was a really long fruit salad.

2. "I told my friend that I put pineapples in everything I eat. He said he never knew someone could be so 'pine-crazy.'"
4. - A pineapple is like a spiky ballerina.

- When life gives you lemons, ask for a pineapple upside down cake instead.

* Why did the watermelon go to bed early? Because it was trying to get a good night's rest!

* "Why did the watermelon go to the doctor? Because it was feeling melancholic!"
* "I told my wife she should eat more watermelon because it's healthy. She said, 'Yeah, but I don't want to get caught in a fruit salad!'"
4. Why did the watermelon go to the doctor? Because it was feeling juicy!
